Title: Cardiovascular Risk Merits Attention in Newly Diagnosed Gout
Teaser: The risk was elevated in the first 30 days after diagnosis but less so in patients who received anti-inflammatory drugs.

Title: Reduced Starch, Sucrose Diet On Par With Low FODMAP in IBS
Teaser: Various diets effective in IBS patients.

Title: Stroke: Data Support Genotype-Tailored Antiplatelet Therapy
Teaser: Testing for genetic variants that confer resistance to clopidogrel, followed by appropriately tailored therapy, improved outcomes.

Title: Fifth of UK GPs Using AI Tools Without Formal Guidelines or Support
Teaser: In a UK-wide survey, doctors were asked if they had ever used ChatGPT, Bing AI, Google's Bard, or other AI tools in clinical practice.

Title: Chew on This: Low Fibre Intake Tied to Dentition
Teaser: Older adults turn to beans, potatoes for fibre intake.

Title: Opt-Out Treatment Can Help Reluctant Smokers Quit Smoking
Teaser: An opt-out treatment for tobacco use can be beneficial for people with low motivation to quit, showed the secondary analysis of a clinical trial.

Title: Does Bariatric Surgery Also Improve Thyroid Function?
Teaser: Metabolic/bariatric surgery improved thyroid function and hormone resistance in patients with obesity, which was correlated with improvement in body composition.

Title: Does Pet Ownership Promote Children's Development?
Teaser: A UK study found no apparent emotional or cognitive benefits, but possible upsides emerged.

Title: Immunotherapy Improves Survival in Early Triple-Negative Breast Cancer
Teaser: The KEYNOTE-522 trial found that pembrolizumab extends overall survival by 4.9 percentage points over chemotherapy alone.

Title: Diabetic Foot Problems Disrupt Lives, Across Ethnicities
Teaser: Lack of knowledge and barriers to access were common themes.

Title: Higher BMI in Both Women and Men Tied to Lower Fertility
Teaser: Findings applied to men and women in the preconception period, and, in women, early pregnancy.
